summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 2.1°C) and outside temperature (up 1.6°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 2.8 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 8862 lux) and cloud levels (up 327 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 14292 lux), cloud levels (up 1906 m), outside temperature (up 2.0°C), and inside temperature (up 2.4°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 326.7m lower than yesterday, 824.9m lower than the past week, 1906.1m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 713m to a maximum of 1594m, averaging 740.2m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 1565.1m and 2650m respectively.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; mild and pleasant. Also, extremely heavy humidity levels and little or no wind. Moderate rainfall, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and light levels will be low during the day. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
